title: Supplement Store - Naturopathic Health & Wellness - Wildcraft Medicine
description: Sign up for an account and start shopping in the Supplement Store. Wildcraft Medicine is your Naturopathic Health & Wellness Center in La Jolla San Diego
cleaned_text: SUPPLEMENT STORE Fullscript Click on the link below to log on to Dr. Hernandez's or Dr. Cloyd's personalized dispensary to find your supplements from your treatment plan. You will be required to make a free account with Wellevate. From here you can log on whenever you want to order your supplements by searching for them. Wellevate carries Naturopathic trusted supplement companies. Not all supplements are made equally. It is very important to make sure you are taking supplements with vitamins and herbs in the easy to absorb and active forms, as well as with the right dosing. Always check with your doctor before taking supplements to make sure they are right
